name: webterm.github
description: Here is a simple demo of a web terminal (over HTTP or HTTPS). It was initially based on the Wetty project. It uses WebSocket (socket.io) for "real-time" communication between a backend command (e.g. bash) running on a *node.js* server and a frontend presentation in your browser (based on xterm.js). An *express* web server is also used on the 'node.js' server, to serve some static pages.
author: orel33 <aurelien.esnard@u-bordeaux.fr>
